title: LEMON CHEESECAKE TM 31
directions: Press biscuit mixture into 8inch/20cm spingform tin, and place in fridge to set
Place condensed milk, cream cheese and thickened cream in clean TM bowl.
Mix for 30secs/speed 6, adding lemon juice in a steady stream for the last 15 seconds
Pour mixture over prepared biscuit base and refridgerate minimum 6 hours, preferably overnight, until set.
Decorate with cream and fruit of choice (eg strawberries) before serving.
